title: Pool Party Renekton Chroma
body: Riot, can you please make my dream come true and make pool party Renekton chromas. I'd really appreciate it and I'd use them like everyday. Thank you

replies.body:
I don't have any kind of info or ETA on this if it's something that's in the works. If you post this over in concepts and creations you should be able to get more visibility and, who knows, maybe uncle Rito will take you up on that idea!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
